alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 13 at 3:21AM EDT until March 15 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures between 27 to 30 degrees possible. * WHERE...Halifax, Nash, Edgecombe and Wilson Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
